description:
Libdvdcss-2 releases compiled for HandBrake for Windows by allienx 

By default tries to copy to handbrake install directories, but you can also specify your own directory to copy to.

### Package Specific
#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/CopyDir64:` - Optional extra directory to place the 64 bit lib
 * `/CopyDir32:` - Optional extra directory to place the 32 bit lib
 * `/NoHandbrakeCopy' - Optional parameter to disable auto copying to handbrake install directories. 

To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install packageID [other options] --params="'/ITEM:value /ITEM2:value2 /FLAG_BOOLEAN'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.
summary: A simple library designed for accessing DVDs like a block device without having to bother about the decryption.
author: VideoLAN
